languages.text: "Прошу, Дитя, не упрямьтесь. Помните о долге перед Домом, и путь эти мысли предают вам сил".

traits.locale_text: "Прошу, Дитя, не упрямьтесь. Помните о долге перед Домом, и путь эти мысли предают вам сил".

languages.text: "Please, Child, do not be stubborn. Remember your duty to the House and let those thoughts bring you strength."
languages.original_text: "Прошу, Дитя, не упрямьтесь. Помните о долге перед Домом, и путь эти мысли предают вам сил".

traits.locale_text: "Please, Child, do not be stubborn. Remember your duty before the House, and let these thoughts give you strength."
"Please, Child, do not be stubborn. Remember your duty before the House, and let these thoughts give you strength."
"Please, Child, do not be stubborn. Remember your duty to the House and let those thoughts bring you strength."
"Please, Child, do not be stubborn. Remember your duty to the House and let those thoughts bring you strength."
"Please, Child, do not be stubborn. Remember your duty to the House and let those thoughts bring you strength."

languages.text: “拜托了，圣子，请不要固执。别忘了你对家族的责任，让你的责任成为你的支柱吧。”
languages.original_text: "Please, Child, do not be stubborn. Remember your duty to the House and let those thoughts bring you strength."

traits.locale_text: “拜托了，孩子，请不要固执。别忘了你对家族的责任，让你的责任成为你的支柱吧。”

languages.text: «Por favor, niña, no insistas. Recuerda tu deber hacia la casa y deja que te dé fuerzas».
languages.original_text: "Please, Child, do not be stubborn. Remember your duty to the House and let those thoughts bring you strength."

traits.locale_text: «Por favor, niña, no insistas. Recuerda tu deber hacia la casa y deja que te dé fuerzas».

languages.text: 「お願いです、御子よ、どうか聞いてください。あなたに課せられたオルセリオ家の義務を思い出すのです、それが力となりましょう」
languages.original_text: "Please, Child, do not be stubborn. Remember your duty to the House and let those thoughts bring you strength."

traits.locale_text: 「お願いです、御子よ、拒んではなりません。あなたに課せられたオルセリオ家の義務を思い出すのです、それが力となりましょう」
「お願いです、御子よ、どうか聞いてください。あなたに課せられたオルセリオ家の義務を思い出すのです、それが力となりましょう」

languages.text: « Je vous en prie, Enfant, montrez-vous raisonnable. Rappelez-vous votre devoir envers la maison et laissez ces pensées vous donner de la force. »
languages.original_text: "Please, Child, do not be stubborn. Remember your duty to the House and let those thoughts bring you strength."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous en prie, mon enfant, montrez-vous raisonnable. Rappelez-vous votre devoir envers la maison et laissez ces pensées vous donner de la force. »

languages.text: "Bitte, Kind, seid nicht stur. Erinnert Euch an Eure Pflicht gegenüber dem Haus, und schöpft aus diesen Gedanken Kraft."
languages.original_text: "Please, Child, do not be stubborn. Remember your duty to the House and let those thoughts bring you strength."

traits.locale_text: "Bitte, Kind, seid nicht stur. Erinnert Euch an Eure Pflicht gegenüber dem Haus, und schöpft aus diesen Gedanken Kraft."

languages.original_text: "Please, Child, do not be stubborn. Remember your duty to the House and let those thoughts bring you strength."

languages.text: "Lütfen Çocuk, inatçılık etme. Hanene olan vazifeni hatırla. Bu düşünceler sana güç versin."
languages.original_text: "Please, Child, do not be stubborn. Remember your duty to the House and let those thoughts bring you strength."

traits.locale_text: "Lütfen Çocuk, inatçılık etme. Hanene olan vazifeni hatırla. Bu düşünceler sana güç versin."
